data.name: Escape Abstraction Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The Escape Abstraction Soundtrack features all 6 contemplative and captivating songs exclusively made for Escape Abstraction, featuring an additional live version.
Let this 10 minutes long album carry you away, wondering through these meditative masterpieces offering you a whole new perspective.
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: 7 different tracks to dive into Abstraction once again...
